name: Dance Expanse
description:
Join together bongo-playing bears and disco-dancing tree people to create a network of music and resource abundance! However, all is not well on the Dance Expanse, as a dark entity looms on the horizon that will corrupt your network and spread its music-hating bad vibes everywhere. Welcome, gamer, to the Dance Expanse!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move camera

Click once on a character and then click on another character to connect them. The line will turn red if the character doesn't have enough wood to build the connection.

'C' to cancel a connection

Mouse wheel to zoom in and out

Right-click drag to move camera
